examples: I have yet to see the results
details are yet to be worked out

definitions.text: used in negative statement to describe a situation that has existed up to this point or up to the present time
to a greater degree or extent; used with comparisons
examples: looked sick and felt even worse
an even (or still) more interesting problem
still another problem must be solved

definitions.text: within an indefinite time or at an unspecified future time
examples: he longed for the flowers that were yet to show themselves
sooner or later you will have to face the facts
in time they came to accept the harsh reality
this is the best so far

definitions.text: despite anything to the contrary (usually following a concession)
examples: although I'm a little afraid, however I'd like to try it
while we disliked each other, nevertheless we agreed
he was a stern yet fair master
granted that it is dangerous, all the same I still want to go
